overview: Sana Chebaro has extensive experience in strategic management, marketing and in the nonprofit arena. Most recently, Sana was Global Marketing Manager for Agence France-Presse (AFP) in Paris, heading the video and multimedia department. Sana also worked as an Associate at A.T. Kearney, a management consulting firm. Her projects involved developing a 5-10 year strategic vision, mission and value-creating business model for a state-owned investment company and developed a turnaround strategy and implementation program for a large Middle East owned telecom. Previously, Sana worked for Ashoka, a vanguard Social Entrepreneurship organization, finding innovative ways to finance the social sector and created a social networking strategy to connect donors and entrepreneurs. Sana also worked as a Development Associate for Seeds of Peace, a conflict resolution non-profit organization and as an Investment Counselor for The Citigroup Private Bank. Sana received her MBA degree with a focus on Strategic Management from The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania and graduated Magna Cum Laude with a double BA major in International Relations and French Literature from Tufts University.

degrees.subject: Strategic Management
degrees.institution: The Wharton School, University of Pennsylvania
